rules.text: No body shaming, ageism, casteism, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or xenophobia
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of any user
No intentionally false or misleading information
No non-sexual nudity that directs to sex businesses or accounts
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Mark violent media with a content warning
Mark sexually-explicit nudity with a content warning
Mark AI-generated accounts as AI-generated in the account's description
Complete your account with a profile picture, cover picture, and description
